summary:
Follower mod
Beautiful Thief Ready To Role!
descriptionHtml:
Nicola The Thief 

Simple But nice follower mod. 
A pretty young Imperial girl named nicola, Tough and sneaky and always there to back you up. 

Shes been made with SkyHair! But doesent require the mod to play! 
Also used Better Females by bella! Also not required! 

I do Recommend these mods though for your own gaming pleasure as they are outstanding mods! 
But You play the way you want so that is entirely up to you! 

Installation - Extract NTT To your Skyrim dictionary!
Remember to enable your mods! :)

Nicola is located outside dragons reach in whiterun.!!!! 
Ask her to follow and shes yours! 

I created the mod and take all credit 
Use at your leasure and pleasure! 

Happy hunting. 

Thank you 
Bethesda for skyrim and all your other fantastic games. 
Bella for Better Females by bella 
And ApachiSkyhair! for Some beautiful artwork on them hair styles!
author: MM
